text: Are kꞌu ri tinimit ubꞌiꞌnam utz taq uchiꞌ jaꞌ man chajital taj, rumal riꞌ xibꞌibꞌal ikꞌowem chilaꞌ. E kꞌi chike ri kebꞌin pa ri plo are jeꞌl chike kiꞌkꞌow pa ri tinimit Fenice, ri kꞌo apanoq choch ri uchiꞌ jaꞌ pa ri tinimit Creta, ri Fenice sibꞌalaj jun utz laj uchiꞌ jaꞌ jawjeꞌ kikꞌowisax wi ri qꞌotaj rech jabꞌ.
